did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Virginia Board for Professional Soil Scientists and Wetland Professionals,
did.origination: Virginia. Board for Professional Soil Scientists and Wetland Professionals.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: In 1987 The Board for Professional Soil Scientists was created to certify professional soil scientist for the "preservation of health, safety and welfare of the citizens of Virginia". The code of Virginia in 2004 reflects the inclusion and addition of Wetland Professionals in the regulatory requirements for Professional Soil Scientists. In 2012, the Board was merged with the Board for Geologists to create the Board for Professional Soil Scientists, Wetland Professionals, and Geologists

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation record group (RG 17)

accessrestrict.p: Meeting attachments must be reviewed for personal information and redacted prior to being served.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Board for Professional Soil Scientists, Minutes, 2001-2005. Accession 42991, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 42991 was transferred by Borkey, Alexina, M., 11/27/2006

scopecontent.p: Minutes, agendas and related attachments documenting the activities of the Virginia Board for Soil Scientists and Wetlands Professionals. May also include informal fact finding conference records and conflict of interest statements.
